text: This is a list of Romanian European Film Award winners and nominees. This list details the performances of Romanian actors, actresses, and films that have either been submitted or nominated for, or have won, a European Film Award. ==Main categories== {| Porumboiu for 12:08 East of Bucharest || || |- |rowspan="4"| 2007 || Best Film || 4 Months, 3 Weeks and 2 Days || || |- | Best Actress || Anamaria Marinca for 4 Months, 3 Weeks and 2 Days || || |- | || George Piştereanu for If I Want to Whistle, I Whistle || || Romanian-German-Swedeish co- production |- | Best Screenwriter || Radu Mihăileanu for The Concert || || Romanian-born France based |- | 2012 || Best Screenwriter || Cristian Mungiu for Beyond the Hills || || |- |rowspan="2"| 2013 || Best European Co-Producer || Ada Solomon || || |- | Best Actress || Luminița Gheorghiu for Child's Pose
